summary: This package implements the infrastructure for locating, downloading, and loading Terraform modules so they can be analyzed. It defines data structures for module content and parameters, utilities to discover module definitions in configuration files, an abstract loader with dynamic implementation selection, and a central registry to manage loader instances and caching.
business_intent: Enable the security scanning tool to automatically resolve and retrieve external Terraform modules, prepare them for analysis, and provide a unified loading mechanism that supports different source types and caching, thereby ensuring comprehensive IaC security checks.
